lender.name: Fumy
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand

lender.loan_because: Love, hope, grace, peace.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to society
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs for others to use in brochures, magazines, ads, etc.

lender.name: Carry
lender.loan_because: I want to give hard-working people the chance to succeed so they can provide their families with opportunities to prosper

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: "What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal." -Pike

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student/athlete/volunteer with the occasional soccer-refereeing gig. I don't have a real job yet.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: All of our lives have been enhanced by others. I am thankful for so many blessings and want to help others on their journey. I am passionate about agriculture.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others improve their lives and those in their local communities
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of a computer department in a big business in Australia

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I know people sometimes need a break in order to succeed. With opportunity, people are able to improve their lives. I admire people who start their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I teach U.S. Government and Economics at a high school in Los Angeles, California, United States. My students range from age 17 to 20.

lender.name: Helen Netramai
lender.loan_because: I'm just glad I can help.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.occupational_info: I will soon be launching Equality Case Files, a website where people can get information about and keep up-to-date on the status of litigation impacting LGBT rights in the United States.

lender.name: Evie
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate for Christmas from some good family friends, and decided to loan to people who share my love and passion for making food, as well as those whose stories speak to me and inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a Public school in a small town. I come from a small and relatively wealthy family, and enjoy baking, cooking, and learning about both.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want kids all around the world to grow up healthy, and to do that they need whole fresh locally grown fruits, vegetables, seeds and nuts raised in an ecological and sustainable manner.
lender.occupational_info: I am a gardener who does community work to increase consumption of health garden crops and decrease the consumption of (low nutrition/high calorie) processed foods and beverages that damage health.

lender.name: Arte
lender.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We help local Artisans in Dubai, promote their work and would like to do the same around the world !

lender.name: le thi le thuy
lender.loan_because: toi muon vay de lay tien mo 1 cua hang kinh doanh bep gas va gas
lender.occupational_info: toi se hoan tra lai so tien ca goc lan lai trong thoi gian 24thang

lender.name: Sarah Kate
lender.loan_because: I was born in a country where even students with minimal incomes like me can afford to give $25 donations. A website like this can make that a reality in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a sub shop that makes sandwiches with deep fried foods. Our most popular sub consists of steak, cheese, chicken fingers, mozzerella sticks, french fries, ketchup and mayo, all on an 8 inch sub roll.

lender.name: Thomas Family
lender.loan_because: We are very blessed and wish to help others.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur myself I know some initial capital can start something big.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Realtor, but am trying to branch out into many businesses and turn my last name into a well known brand.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: by accident of birth I was fortunate to grow up with many privileges. It is now more important than ever to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with software and computers.

lender.name: Bianca
lender.occupational_info: mother and nurse

lender.name: Buddy
lender.loan_because: it's too easy to help others and this is a great way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I design and manage computer systems

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because:
I think it is important to help other people, but I feel loaning is better than donating to a charity because as an individual I am taking responsibility over where the money is going and with Kiva you can actually follow the success of each project.
Obviously donating to emergency aid appeals is still really important but I do feel that microfinancing with the help of sites like Kiva is a fantastic idea and this is the future of international aid, finally the individual can feel in control of their own situation and that means the borrowers AND the lenders.
Its a Win Win Win situation!

lender.name: Merle
lender.loan_because: His Holiness The Dalai Lama teaches "be kind". What greater kindness than helping others help themselves?

lender.name: Chutney Club
lender.loan_because: We have raised funds in our annual Christmas Raffle for good deeds.
lender.occupational_info: We meet 4 times a year to trade homemade chutney, jams and preserves.

lender.name: Magnus Rydstrm
lender.loan_because: We all deserve the same opportunities in life, regardless of nationality or background.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures, then I process them and select the ones I like ;).

lender.name: Ayako
lender.loan_because: This system is absolutely good idea so I just would like to help someone who has dream. I have cancer and many people help me a lot, so, I think I should help someone whom I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects of computer systems for a company.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I am blessed by God with all I need and feel a responsibility to help those less fortunate than me. My picture is of me in the morning with my first cuppa, go ahead and laugh...I do!
lender.occupational_info: I move everything from documents to aircraft parts to human organs for transplant and research around the world in 24 to 72 hours, on the phone and computer with people all around the world every day.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...everyone could use a helping hand at times......
lender.occupational_info: I cut hair

lender.name: Boldwater
lender.loan_because: I love to support people all around the world

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a journalist in Abu Dhabi with The National newspaper

lender.name: Joost
lender.loan_because: I think traditional aid programs (donating) isn't motivating people to take lead of their own future. This is! For me it's nice to help people with ideals that match mine.
lender.occupational_info: The fun of teaching is seeing your studens grow as a human being.

lender.name: Scott & Nobuko
lender.loan_because: We've been so blessed ...

lender.name: maddy
lender.loan_because: I would like to help to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference to areas I have visited and cultures that have touched me
lender.occupational_info: I take care of other peoples businesses

lender.name: Olive King Foundation
lender.loan_because: It gives me a more direct way of using my donations in the way I would like.

lender.name: Elliot
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good thing to do for the people of the countries who need money to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: Very Important, as it helps build up someones life.

lender.name: steff
lender.loan_because: I think this is a better way to help people than giving money to charity

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an American college - developing advertisements, writing newsletters, developing online communities.

lender.name: MARCOS VIRGINIO
lender.loan_because: Estou desempregado desde o ano de 2007, isto afetou meu psiquico, perdi tudo, estou hoje vivendo uma situao muito carente. Preciso de capital para recomear, sem capital eu no consigo sair desta situao to miservel.
lender.occupational_info: J atuei em vrios nichos de mercado, atualmente sou especialista em gesto de negcios, consigo fazer qualquer produto desconhecido ser uma marca muito vendida, todavia para executar esta ao tem que ter capital para bancar as despesas.

lender.name: georg
lender.loan_because: it is the fairest way to support people in developing countries
lender.occupational_info: councelling families with all kind of problems

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to invest in other peoples' lives. I am not financially wealthy, but this site permits me to give from my resources.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees with their medical insurance and employment questions. My goal is to make the workplace a better experience for my co-workers.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I've been well blessed and I want to lend a helping hand to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Helping families and business owners make sound financial decisions.

lender.name: Danna
lender.loan_because: As a person born in poverty I want to help other people to have the same opportunity to change their lives for the better that I enjoyed.
lender.occupational_info: I test medicines for safety and purity.

lender.name: Joan and Keith
lender.loan_because: We want to help empower others in their desire to grow and support their families, becoming independent members of society and in turn helping others.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I see it as a way to give a hand-up instead of a hand-out. God has so blessed me, that I want to try to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I applaud hard work!
lender.occupational_info: I work to grow business (in areas of science) to make life better.

lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to directly help people.

lender.name: Frank and Erica
lender.loan_because: pay it forward...

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have to struggle to save every penny just to buy food every week, and if I can do something to keep someone else from having to fight so hard, I will.
lender.occupational_info: I want to start a career in government so that I can do everything I can to improve people's lives everywhere.

lender.loan_because: I want to help people buy sheep and cows and candies
lender.occupational_info: playing, swimming at the lake and going to school

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is important to help the people who need and deserve it. It makes me feel good every time I make a loan.

lender.name: carla
lender.loan_because: l believe in kiva
lender.occupational_info: work as a volunteer for several african countries and local groups

lender.name: Mike & Lisa
lender.loan_because: God has great love and affection for every living person. His love urges us to try to help.
lender.occupational_info: We tell people about interesting product and services that can make their lives better. We also teach other people to do the same.

lender.name: Giuseppe
lender.loan_because: I am human.

lender.name: Ezra
lender.loan_because: It keeps me human

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become successful and of course, strive for world peace!

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I believe what goes around comes around. Give and Receive.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I believe in loving others and a friend encouraged me to do so....
lender.occupational_info: Skylark Images is a fine art printmaking studio offering state of the art digital services for artists, photographers, galleries and museums. Pioneers in both Gicle printing (digital fine art reproduction) and color management, we have been industry leaders well over a decade.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I read half the sky by nick kristoff and it changed the way i view women in the world.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: It's fun to make connections with people all across the world. Plus, my money didn't have anything better to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research on the production and perception of the sounds used in language.

lender.occupational_info: I myself currently trying to come up in life. Just started a new company. Hope that I could be successful and help others.

lender.name: jayapandian

lender.name: Bill

lender.name: Carroll
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help someone start a business for such a small amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand and purchase Medicare Insurance plans.

lender.name: Kim
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect natural resources, like farm land and fresh water, so people can eat well and live well.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help change the world for the better. Americans are generally a very fortunate group of people. All of us could benefit from better direct relationships with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology. I love the outdoors, the mountains and oceans.

lender.name: Vessie
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel like I am making a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, on a computer, with lots of numbers and paperwork.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because:
I care. Little drops of water make the mighty ocean.
The mother of revolution and crime is poverty Aristotle quotes.

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: Having started my own organization, I know that it is difficult to get the initial funds needed to make a business work. I have lived in a 3rd world country and know that it can be even harder there!
lender.occupational_info: I run an organization, HILLS, that takes people with developmental disabilities on vacation trips all over the United States. Many of our participants have never been on a plane before and they get to explore new places, make new friends, and learn new things.

lender.name: Angelina
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: Caring and helping.

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am the publisher of a group of community newspapers.

lender.name: Jaswinder
lender.loan_because: its makes me feel capable by helping others become capable.

lender.name: Karen
lender.whereabouts: Shangri La La of my own making
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering people to help themselves is the path to true and lasting prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I love books, animals, learning, writing and friends.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and invest in the lives of others.

lender.name: Blake Swopes
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am without the support of friends and family. We all need a hand every now and then. Right now, I'm in a position where I can be the one offering help.
lender.occupational_info: I keep web sites up and running.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: helping people that want to make something out of their life makes me happy =]
lender.occupational_info: I am just a student at a high school. I am about to graduate and next I will go to college for to major in Business.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to try to make a difference in the lives of others that do not have as much as I do materially.
lender.occupational_info: I love my work. I am a professor and teach people that are going to be teachers of children from birth through third grade (age 8)

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I am blessed by giving and really enjoy helping others!

lender.name: P&D
lender.loan_because: This was a gift to us that we are thrilled to be using. The gift that truly keeps on giving.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it supports social equity.
lender.occupational_info: I work promting energy efficiency and renewable energy.

lender.name: Skye
lender.loan_because: it blows my mind that money i would usually leave sitting in the bank has the ability to travel over seas and help a mother support her family.
lender.occupational_info: High school...you know how it is ;)

lender.name: Brian Forbes Colgate
lender.loan_because:
I loan to Nicaragua because I went there with a mission from Queen's Theological College, Queen's University at Kingston, Ontario, Canada in 1992.
One of our team members became critically ill while we were there, and her life was saved by doctors at the Baptist Hospital. Another team member died of cancer shortly after our return, so I donate to Nicaragua in thankfulness for their lives.
Mostly, I support Kiva because I was introduced to it by my elder daughter, Midwife Mhairi :-)

lender.name: Rex
lender.loan_because: this program encourages people to work their way to a better life. It's not a hand-out, it's a loan that goes to people who understand the responsibility of repaying it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm building a new library in Baku...

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: to live in a society with great privilege, I feel a moral imperative to provide assistance to those in need. To me this organization is not a charity, thus an inferiority/superiority complex shouldn't arises in the mind of either the lender or the lendee.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student studying heart disease and mechanisms by which it arises. By understanding how heart disease arises, we can get closer to elucidating a cure for many disease etiologies.

lender.name: Ken & Sandy
lender.loan_because: Lovers of our own lands, we are citizens of the world, conscious partakers in the sacrament of all human life or, more truly of all sentient life. Emily Greene Balch, February 1922
lender.occupational_info: Sandy is a graduate student studying history and Ken is a portfolio manager.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people out.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: Poverty is the worst kind of violence that can be visited upon any population. Loans that help to spark the entrepreneurial spirit anywhere is a benefit to people everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I transport large amounts of materials like dirt, gravel and clay for construction purposes.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can

lender.name: Ed.
lender.loan_because: I know how tough it is in agriculture at the moment.
lender.occupational_info: Livestock management. Primarily ultrasound pregnancy diagnosis in sheep. Also crop harvesting over the summer.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Crispin
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that money given to me as gifts is helping others make a living.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to make sure people have the opportunity to succeed and become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I help a company know where they are making / (losing) money.

lender.name: Paul and Jen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping these people get started and keep going, knowing how difficult it can be owning your own business and/or farming
lender.occupational_info: Greenhouse Operation with Cut and Potted Flowers

lender.name: Jayme
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: For some people, yoga is a spiritual practice, a prayerful dance. For others, it simply feels good to move and stretch the body. I guide groups of people through yoga sequences to lift the spirit and connect with God.

lender.name: Jo Ann
lender.occupational_info: Mother to my two children and part time stock photographer

lender.name: IFreeCan
lender.loan_because:
In a world like today, the monetary system is structured to keep the unfortunate as they are, and the advantaged powerful. We are all humans. We all need hope, help, support and equity among us. I loan to break the current monetary cycle.
Even if 30% of the world's population joined Kiva and contributed without expecting a return, the world would be a better place with less poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We innovate ways to channel hidden potentials to produce a positive impact within communities.

lender.name: Dane
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school. I enjoy engineering, electronics and hiking.

lender.name: Forrest
lender.loan_because: I know it will can make a difference in this unfair world.
lender.occupational_info: I work from home and travel a lot throughout the United States.

lender.name: Mike & Esme'
lender.loan_because: if we can help some one along the way then our lives would not be in vain

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I can, and I enjoy doing so. I am trying to loan at least an additional $25 every paycheck I get
lender.occupational_info: I help design and build prototype medical equipment--I am still a student working towards my graduation in the field of electrical engineering.

lender.name: Las Vegas Meditation
lender.loan_because: We want to help others to have happy, healthy and prosperous lives.
lender.occupational_info: We meet a couple of times a month to sit in meditation focusing on the peace within us, expanding our hearts capacity to love and celebrate what we can give joyfully! Peace to you our fellow friends.

lender.name: Tom & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: God is great! and Bruce Moore and Jan Chapman introduced us to Kiva in Dec 2009.

lender.name: K.A.
lender.loan_because: It feels great to be able to "pay it forward" in another way, and better yet -to help someone help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an optometrist (eye doctor) in the United States

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I believe in equalizing the wealth in this world by supporting small entrepreneurs from all over this world financially and by assisting them in word and deed. I believe that sustainable development is the only way forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer / consultant specializing in validation of equipment and clean utilities within the life science industry. I love the outdoors!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: my daughter gave me the gift of choosing persons to loan to.
lender.occupational_info: I try to coax young people who want to teach to see the school class as a more complicated situation than they thought it was.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves while maintaining their dignity and pride.
lender.occupational_info: I program complex business telephone systems and train the employees how to use them.

lender.name: Marina
lender.loan_because: Times are hard so it's even more important that I try to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories, stories that can be made into movies. So that people can relax and enjoy themselves.

lender.loan_because: help one another

lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: This is simply the greatest idea of which I've ever heard.

lender.name: Theodore
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the same opportunity to better themselves

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate from one of my students on my bus. I think this is a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I drive children back and forth to school 5 days a week from Kindergarten to grade 12. I love my job and working with the children.

lender.name: Krystal
lender.loan_because: The stories are more than just statistics.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
